messages.title: Plan for Britain's Future
messages.content: STOP BREXIT. Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
TACKLE THE CLIMATE EMERGENCY. Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
GIVE EVERY CHILD THE BEST START IN LIFE. Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
BUILD A FAIRER ECONOMY. Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
TRANSFORM OUR MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES. Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child the Best Start in Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservatives have become a party promoting an extremist view of isolationism.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: I've worked in the green industry for 20 years and it's clear to me the Liberal Democrats have the best plan to tackle the climate emergency. We can't afford to wait any longer and I trust Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats to bring about the change we also desperately need.

I'm backing the Liberal Democrats because they've led the fight for mental health provision in our NHS. As a psychiatrist I all too often that mental health is seen as the bottom of the pile, be treated with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorser: Gabriel Rozenberg, former Conservative councillor in Barnet
endorsements.endorsement: The Conservatives have become a party promoting an extremist view of isolationism. It wasn't an easy decision to make but I could no longer campaign for them. The Lib Dems are a proudly internationalist party and the only pro-business party left.

I firmly believe that Britain is better off in the EU. As a result I have now found a new home within the Liberal Democrats. I am proud to join a progressive party. I left Labour as a direct consequence of the direction in which the party is moving.

quotes.text: I'm backing the Liberal Democrats because they've led the fight for mental health provision in our NHS. As a psychiatrist I all too often see that mental health is seen as the bottom of the pile, but the Liberal Democrats will transform mental health services, and treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

The Conservatives have become a party promoting an extremist view of isolationism. It wasn't an easy decision to make but I could no longer campaign for them. The Lib Dems are a proudly internationalist party and the only pro-business party left.
quotes.source: Gabriel Rozenberg, former Conservative councillor in Barnet

quotes.text: I firmly believe that Britain is better off in the EU. As a result I have now found a new home within the Liberal Democrats. I am proud to join a progressive party. I left Labour as a direct consequence of the direction in which the party is moving.

personalStories.story: I'm backing the Liberal Democrats because they've led the fight for mental health provision in our NHS. As a psychiatrist I all too often see that mental health is seen as the bottom of the pile, but the Liberal Democrats will transform mental health services, and treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

The Conservatives have become a party promoting an extremist view of isolationism. It wasn't an easy decision to make but I could no longer campaign for them. The Lib Dems are a proudly internationalist party and the only pro-business party left.

I firmly believe that Britain is better off in the EU. As a result I have now found a new home within the Liberal Democrats. I am proud to join a progressive party. I left Labour as a direct consequence of the direction in which the party is moving.
